verses.verse: וַיֵּצֵ֞א <S%H3318><s%> came forth הַגּוֹרָ֤ל <S%H1486><s%> lot הַשֵּׁנִי֙ <S%H8145><s%> And the second לְשִׁמְע֔וֹן <S%H8095><s%> to Simeon לְמַטֵּ֥ה <S%H4294><s%> [even] for the tribe בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children שִׁמְע֖וֹן <S%H8095><s%> of Simeon לְמִשְׁפְּחוֹתָ֑ם <S%H4940><s%> according to their families וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> become נַֽחֲלָתָ֔ם <S%H5159><s%> and their inheritance בְּת֖וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> was within נַחֲלַ֥ת <S%H5159><s%> the inheritance בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah

וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> had לָהֶ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> like בְּנַֽחֲלָתָ֑ם <S%H5159><s%> And they had in their inheritance בְּאֵֽר־ שֶׁ֥בַע <S%H884><s%> Beersheba וְשֶׁ֖בַע <S%H7652><s%> or Sheba וּמוֹלָדָֽה׃ <S%H4137><s%> and Moladah
וַחֲצַ֥ר שׁוּעָ֛ל <S%H2705><s%> And Hazarshual וּבָלָ֖ה <S%H1088><s%> and Balah וָעָֽצֶם׃ <S%H6107><s%> and Azem
וְאֶלְתּוֹלַ֥ד <S%H513><s%> And Eltolad וּבְת֖וּל <S%H1329><s%> and Bethul וְחָרְמָֽה׃ <S%H2767><s%> and Hormah
וְצִֽקְלַ֥ג <S%H6860><s%> And Ziklag וּבֵית־ הַמַּרְכָּב֖וֹת <S%H1024><s%> and Bethmarcaboth וַחֲצַ֥ר סוּסָֽה׃ <S%H2701><s%> and Hazarsusah

וּבֵ֥ית לְבָא֖וֹת <S%H1034><s%> And Bethlebaoth וְשָֽׁרוּחֶ֑ן <S%H8287><s%> and Sharuhen עָרִ֥ים <S%H5892><s%> cities שְׁלֹשׁ־ <S%H7969><s%> three עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <S%H6240><s%> ten וְחַצְרֵיהֶֽן׃ <S%H2691><s%> and their villages

עַ֥יִן ׀ <S%H5871><s%> Ain רִמּ֖וֹן <S%H7417><s%> Remmon וָעֶ֣תֶר <S%H6281><s%> and Ether וְעָשָׁ֑ן <S%H6228><s%> and Ashan עָרִ֥ים <S%H5892><s%> cities אַרְבַּ֖ע <S%H702><s%> four וְחַצְרֵיהֶֽן׃ <S%H2691><s%> and their villages

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַֽחֲצֵרִ֗ים <S%H2691><s%> And all the villages אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which סְבִיבוֹת֙ <S%H5439><s%> that [were] round about הֶֽעָרִ֣ים <S%H5892><s%> these cities הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far בַּֽעֲלַ֥ת בְּאֵ֖ר <S%H1192><s%> to Baalathbeer רָ֣אמַת <S%H7414><s%> Ramath נֶ֑גֶב <S%H5045><s%> of the south זֹ֗את <S%H2063><s%> likewise נַחֲלַ֛ת <S%H5159><s%> This [is] the inheritance מַטֵּ֥ה <S%H4294><s%> of the tribe בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children שִׁמְע֖וֹן <S%H8095><s%> of Simeon לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָֽם׃ <S%H4940><s%> according to their families

מֵחֶ֙בֶל֙ <S%H2256><s%> Out of the portion בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah נַחֲלַ֖ת <S%H5159><s%> [was] the inheritance בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children שִׁמְע֑וֹן <S%H8095><s%> of Simeon כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הָיָ֞ה <S%H1961><s%> become חֵ֤לֶק <S%H2506><s%> for the part בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children יְהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah רַ֣ב <S%H7227><s%> was too much מֵהֶ֔ם <S%H1992><s%> of Judah's וַיִּנְחֲל֥וּ <S%H5159><s%> the inheritance בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> for them therefore the children שִׁמְע֖וֹן <S%H8095><s%> of Simeon בְּת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> within נַחֲלָתָֽם׃ <S%H5159><s%> inheritance פ

וַיַּ֙עַל֙ <S%H5927><s%> came up הַגּוֹרָ֣ל <S%H1486><s%> lot הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֔י <S%H7992><s%> And the third לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> for the children זְבוּלֻ֖ן <S%H2074><s%> of Zebulun לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֑ם <S%H4940><s%> according to their families וַיְהִ֛י <S%H1961><s%> become גְּב֥וּל <S%H1366><s%> and the border נַחֲלָתָ֖ם <S%H5159><s%> of their inheritance עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far שָׂרִֽיד׃ <S%H8301><s%> was unto Sarid

וְעָלָ֨ה <S%H5927><s%> went up גְבוּלָ֧ם ׀ <S%H1366><s%> And their border לַיָּ֛מָּה <S%H3220><s%> toward the sea וּמַרְעֲלָ֖ה <S%H4831><s%> and Maralah וּפָגַ֣ע <S%H6293><s%> and reached בְּדַבָּ֑שֶׁת <S%H1708><s%> to Dabbasheth וּפָגַע֙ <S%H6293><s%> and reached אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַנַּ֔חַל <S%H5158><s%> to the river אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> after עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> that פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> that [is] before יָקְנְעָֽם׃ <S%H3362><s%> Jokneam

וְשָׁ֣ב <S%H7725><s%> And turned מִשָּׂרִ֗יד <S%H8301><s%> from Sarid קֵ֚דְמָה <S%H6924><s%> eastward מִזְרַ֣ח <S%H4217><s%> east side הַשֶּׁ֔מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> east side עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> far גְּב֥וּל <S%H1366><s%> unto the border כִּסְלֹ֖ת תָּבֹ֑ר <S%H3696><s%> of Chislothtabor וְיָצָ֥א <S%H3318><s%> and then goeth out אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַדָּֽבְרַ֖ת <S%H1705><s%> to Daberath וְעָלָ֥ה <S%H5927><s%> and goeth up יָפִֽיעַ׃ <S%H3309><s%> to Japhia

וּמִשָּׁ֤ם <S%H8033><s%> there עָבַר֙ <S%H5674><s%> And from thence passeth on along קֵ֣דְמָה <S%H6924><s%> eastward מִזְרָ֔חָה <S%H4217><s%> the sunrise גִּתָּ֥ה חֵ֖פֶר <S%H1662><s%> to Gittahhepher עִתָּ֣ה קָצִ֑ין <S%H6278><s%> to Ittahkazin וְיָצָ֛א <S%H3318><s%> and goeth out רִמּ֥וֹן <S%H7417><s%> to Remmonmethoar הַמְּתֹאָ֖ר <S%H7417><s%> to Rimmon הַנֵּעָֽה׃ <S%H5269><s%> to Neah

וְנָסַ֤ב <S%H5437><s%> compasseth אֹתוֹ֙ <S%H853><s%> הַגְּב֔וּל <S%H1366><s%> And the border מִצְּפ֖וֹן <S%H6828><s%> it on the north side חַנָּתֹ֑ן <S%H2615><s%> to Hannathon וְהָיוּ֙ <S%H1961><s%> become תֹּֽצְאֹתָ֔יו <S%H8444><s%> and the outgoings גֵּ֖י <S%H1516><s%> thereof are in the valley יִפְתַּח־ אֵֽל׃ <S%H3317><s%> of Jiphthahel

וְקַטָּ֤ת <S%H7005><s%> And Kattath וְנַֽהֲלָל֙ <S%H5096><s%> and Nahallal וְשִׁמְר֔וֹן <S%H8110><s%> and Shimron וְיִדְאֲלָ֖ה <S%H3030><s%> and Idalah וּבֵ֣ית לָ֑חֶם <S%H1035><s%> and Bethlehem עָרִ֥ים <S%H5892><s%> cities שְׁתֵּים־ <S%H8147><s%> both עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <S%H6240><s%> ten וְחַצְרֵיהֶֽן׃ <S%H2691><s%> with their villages

זֹ֛את <S%H2063><s%> likewise נַחֲלַ֥ת <S%H5159><s%> This [is] the inheritance בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children זְבוּלֻ֖ן <S%H2074><s%> of Zebulun לְמִשְׁפְּחוֹתָ֑ם <S%H4940><s%> according to their families הֶֽעָרִ֥ים <S%H5892><s%> these cities הָאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these וְחַצְרֵיהֶֽן׃ <S%H2691><s%> with their villages פ

לְיִ֨שָּׂשכָ֔ר <S%H3485><s%> to Issachar יָצָ֖א <S%H3318><s%> came out הַגּוֹרָ֣ל <S%H1486><s%> lot הָֽרְבִיעִ֑י <S%H7243><s%> [And] the fourth לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> for the children יִשָּׂשכָ֖ר <S%H3485><s%> of Issachar לְמִשְׁפְּחוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H4940><s%> according to their families
וַיְהִ֖י <S%H1961><s%> become גְּבוּלָ֑ם <S%H1366><s%> And their border יִזְרְעֶ֥אלָה <S%H3157><s%> was toward Jezreel וְהַכְּסוּלֹ֖ת <S%H3694><s%> and Chesulloth וְשׁוּנֵֽם׃ <S%H7766><s%> and Shunem
וַחֲפָרַ֥יִם <S%H2663><s%> And Hapharaim וְשִׁיאֹ֖ן <S%H7866><s%> and Shion וַאֲנָחֲרַֽת׃ <S%H588><s%> and Anaharath
וְהָֽרַבִּ֥ית <S%H7245><s%> And Rabbith וְקִשְׁי֖וֹן <S%H7191><s%> and Kishion וָאָֽבֶץ׃ <S%H77><s%> and Abez
וְרֶ֧מֶת <S%H7432><s%> And Remeth וְעֵין־ גַּנִּ֛ים <S%H5873><s%> and Engannim וְעֵ֥ין חַדָּ֖ה <S%H5876><s%> and Enhaddah וּבֵ֥ית פַּצֵּֽץ׃ <S%H1048><s%> and Bethpazzez

וּפָגַע֩ <S%H6293><s%> reacheth הַגְּב֨וּל <S%H1366><s%> And the coast בְּתָב֤וֹר <S%H8396><s%> to Tabor [וְשַׁחֲצוּמָה כ] (וְשַׁחֲצִ֙ימָה֙ <S%H7831><s%> Shahazimah ק) וּבֵ֣ית שֶׁ֔מֶשׁ <S%H1053><s%> and Bethshemesh וְהָי֛וּ <S%H1961><s%> become תֹּצְא֥וֹת <S%H8444><s%> and the outgoings גְּבוּלָ֖ם <S%H1366><s%> of their border הַיַּרְדֵּ֑ן <S%H3383><s%> were at Jordan עָרִ֥ים <S%H5892><s%> cities שֵׁשׁ־ <S%H8337><s%> six עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <S%H6240><s%> teen וְחַצְרֵיהֶֽן׃ <S%H2691><s%> with their villages

זֹ֗את <S%H2063><s%> likewise נַחֲלַ֛ת <S%H5159><s%> This [is] the inheritance מַטֵּ֥ה <S%H4294><s%> of the tribe בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשָּׂשכָ֖ר <S%H3485><s%> of Issachar לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֑ם <S%H4940><s%> according to their families הֶעָרִ֖ים <S%H5892><s%> the cities וְחַצְרֵיהֶֽן׃ <S%H2691><s%> and their villages פ

וַיֵּצֵא֙ <S%H3318><s%> came out הַגּוֹרָ֣ל <S%H1486><s%> lot הַֽחֲמִישִׁ֔י <S%H2549><s%> And the fifth לְמַטֵּ֥ה <S%H4294><s%> for the tribe בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children אָשֵׁ֖ר <S%H836><s%> of Asher לְמִשְׁפְּחוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H4940><s%> according to their families

וַיְהִ֖י <S%H1961><s%> become גְּבוּלָ֑ם <S%H1366><s%> And their border חֶלְקַ֥ת <S%H2520><s%> was Helkath וַחֲלִ֖י <S%H2482><s%> and Hali וָבֶ֥טֶן <S%H991><s%> and Beten וְאַכְשָֽׁף׃ <S%H407><s%> and Achshaph

וְאַֽלַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <S%H487><s%> And Alammelech וְעַמְעָ֖ד <S%H6008><s%> and Amad וּמִשְׁאָ֑ל <S%H4861><s%> and Misheal וּפָגַ֤ע <S%H6293><s%> and reacheth בְּכַרְמֶל֙ <S%H3760><s%> to Carmel הַיָּ֔מָּה <S%H3220><s%> westward וּבְשִׁיח֖וֹר לִבְנָֽת׃ <S%H7884><s%> and to Shihorlibnath

וְשָׁ֨ב <S%H7725><s%> And turneth מִזְרַ֣ח <S%H4217><s%> east side הַשֶּׁמֶשׁ֮ <S%H8121><s%> east side בֵּ֣ית דָּגֹן֒ <S%H1016><s%> to Bethdagon וּפָגַ֣ע <S%H6293><s%> and reacheth בִּ֠זְבֻלוּן <S%H2074><s%> to Zebulun וּבְגֵ֨י <S%H1516><s%> and to the valley יִפְתַּח־ אֵ֥ל <S%H3317><s%> of Jiphthahel צָפ֛וֹנָה <S%H6828><s%> toward the north side בֵּ֥ית הָעֵ֖מֶק <S%H1025><s%> of Bethemek וּנְעִיאֵ֑ל <S%H5272><s%> and Neiel וְיָצָ֥א <S%H3318><s%> and goeth out אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to כָּב֖וּל <S%H3521><s%> to Cabul מִשְּׂמֹֽאל׃ <S%H8040><s%> on the left hand

וְעֶבְרֹ֥ן <S%H5683><s%> And Hebron וּרְחֹ֖ב <S%H7340><s%> and Rehob וְחַמּ֣וֹן <S%H2540><s%> and Hammon וְקָנָ֑ה <S%H7071><s%> and Kanah עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> far צִיד֥וֹן <S%H6721><s%> Zidon רַבָּֽה׃ <S%H7227><s%> [even] unto great

וְשָׁ֤ב <S%H7725><s%> turneth הַגְּבוּל֙ <S%H1366><s%> And [then] the coast הָֽרָמָ֔ה <S%H7414><s%> to Ramah וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against עִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> city מִבְצַר־ <S%H4013><s%> and to the strong צֹ֑ר <S%H6865><s%> Tyre וְשָׁ֤ב <S%H7725><s%> turneth הַגְּבוּל֙ <S%H1366><s%> and the coast חֹסָ֔ה <S%H2621><s%> to Hosah [וְיִהְיוּ כ] (וְהָי֧וּ <S%H1961><s%> become ק) תֹצְאֹתָ֛יו <S%H8444><s%> and the outgoings הַיָּ֖מָּה <S%H3220><s%> thereof are at the sea מֵחֶ֥בֶל <S%H2256><s%> from the coast אַכְזִֽיבָה׃ <S%H392><s%> to Achzib

וְעֻמָ֥ה <S%H5981><s%> Ummah וַאֲפֵ֖ק <S%H663><s%> also and Aphek וּרְחֹ֑ב <S%H7340><s%> and Rehob עָרִ֛ים <S%H5892><s%> cities עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> twenty וּשְׁתַּ֖יִם <S%H8147><s%> and two וְחַצְרֵיהֶֽן׃ <S%H2691><s%> with their villages

זֹ֗את <S%H2063><s%> likewise נַחֲלַ֛ת <S%H5159><s%> This [is] the inheritance מַטֵּ֥ה <S%H4294><s%> of the tribe בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children אָשֵׁ֖ר <S%H836><s%> of Asher לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֑ם <S%H4940><s%> according to their families הֶעָרִ֥ים <S%H5892><s%> these cities הָאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these וְחַצְרֵיהֶֽן׃ <S%H2691><s%> with their villages פ

לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> to the children נַפְתָּלִ֔י <S%H5321><s%> of Naphtali יָצָ֖א <S%H3318><s%> came out הַגּוֹרָ֣ל <S%H1486><s%> lot הַשִּׁשִּׁ֑י <S%H8345><s%> The sixth לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> [even] for the children נַפְתָּלִ֖י <S%H5321><s%> of Naphtali לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָֽם׃ <S%H4940><s%> according to their families
